long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables user to save Drudge Report® headlines to read later.
Saves all "Urgent" (red) headlines for reference.  
Marks all Saved and Urgent headlines as read or unread based on user history.
Mouseover headlines to see source of article.
Hides ads on Drudge Report® website.
See screenshots for more info!
***No Personal data leaves the user's browser***
